name: mcp-server-apify-rag-web-browser
description: Use 3,000+ pre-built cloud tools to extract data from websites.

rating.reason: Tool name clearly indicates search functionality. Description adequately explains what the tool does (Google search + web crawling) and provides basic usage guidance with tool recommendations. All parameters have clear descriptions explaining their purpose and constraints, with good examples for the query parameter. Minor weakness: description could better explain when to use this tool versus alternatives, but overall documentation is comprehensive and usable.
